socialmedia.Accounts.interfaces

Interface MiniUser

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    User

    public interface MiniUser
extends java.io.Serializable
    A User class to keep all data about the user, including functions that change and modify this data. Each user is given their own unique id and handle, as well as an optional description

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      add a comment to the user, this would be called when this user has posted a comment
